text: "Walk On" is a 2001 song by Irish rock group U2. It is the fourth track and single from their 10th studio album All That You Can't Leave Behind and went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Australia, number 1 in Portugal and Canada, number 7 in Ireland and number 8 in the Netherlands. It won a Grammy Award in 2002 and the song's lyrics deal with Burma and following the September 11, 2001 attacks, the band dedicated the song in the memory of the Twin Towers. ==Formats and track listings== ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Rock songs
title: Walk On (U2 song)
